item.description:
The Boston Fed covers all of New England so we figured we should make the trip worth everyone's while. Now announcing...

AFTER RALLY PARTY!
Jose McIntyre’s / 160 Milk Street / 4:30- 8:30 pm / 21+
Your MC for the evening will be Eric Bickford. It’s his birthday weekend, so give him big love.
He will introduce our talent: J ROY, Prince Vega, and Erron Geer Music! These folks have generously agreed to play for us, at no cost. A huge thanks to them, Sky Weir, and Kristin Alpert for helping me get them on board. There will be a soapbox session for people to air their views of the Federal Reserve, Quantitative Easing, Bernanke, a...nd the like. There will also be a few vending and liberty information tables including SunsofLibertySilver.com and http://freestateproject.org/. Food and drink are available for purchase. See Y’awl there!!!!
http://www.reverbnation.com/theofficialjroy
http://www.reverbnation.com/#!/princevegaonline
item.name: Boston Audit the Fed After Rally Party
